itunes:title: Episode 774 - Special Guest Of Mice and Men's Aaron Pauley
title: Episode 774 - Special Guest Of Mice and Men's Aaron Pauley
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Dan Hollaway and Papa G are joined by Of Mice and Men bassist and lead singer Aaron Pauley to talk about the metal he grew up listening to, how ridiculous the central California metal scene was and still is, what playing Warped Tour was like, and the tim...
itunes:summary:
Dan Hollaway and Papa G are joined by Of Mice and Men bassist and lead singer Aaron Pauley to talk about the metal he grew up listening to, how ridiculous the central California metal scene was and still is, what playing Warped Tour was like, and the time a forklift attacked him while he was dropping a deuce in a festival Port-a-John.
